terrible-hack.name: TerribleHack
terrible-hack.description: Helped organize and run a recurring comedic hackathon in Waterloo

coursera-full-stack.name: Coursera Full Stack
coursera-full-stack.description:
Launched a new Dashboard and Course Home with many progress tracking features improving course completions by 13%
Rewrote Dashboard frontend and supported on backend as part of a GraphQl pilot project to improve performance
Made design/performance improvements on Dashboard, Course Home, and Assignments/Course Info tabs, including better session switching, tabulating and paginating Dashboard and many more

coursera-mobile.name: Coursera Mobile
coursera-mobile.description:
Built a new Course List (main page), support for Peer Review assignments, an Accomplishments page and many more features
Rewrote large parts of the app to fit with our newer architecture, helped design a new data layer for efficient caching/loading

enflick.name: Enflick
enflick.description:
Implemented TextNow floating chat, a new call screen and messaging interface, and a Premium/Wireless redesign
Fixed numerous bugs and made performance improvements to various parts of the app

tech-retreat.name: TechRetreat
tech-retreat.description:
Helped plan Waterlooâ€™s first High-school Hackathon/Learnathon, Co-ran the Learnathon
Taught attendees to build AIs for TechTanks (2015), and wrote Android Learnathon lesson plan (2016)

army-commander.name: Army Commander
army-commander.description:
Create/control an army using custom gestures for different formations or actions
Enemies form groups and work together to defend themselves

techtanks.name: TechTanks
techtanks.description:
Browser based game to teach Ruby, players write AIs to control tanks and battle against their friends
Used at TechRetreat and Hack the North

ddr-generation.name: DDR Step Generation
ddr-generation.description:
Takes in an mp3 and outputs a step file that fits the style of the music
Extracts features relevant to the music and feeds through a series of models to generate steps

news-feed.name: News Feed
news-feed.description:
Parse content and summaries from set of news RSS feeds
Train model from those and source, time, etc to recommend articles a user would be likely to read

3d-viewer.name: 3D Viewer
3d-viewer.description:
3D viewer for Android, turn your phone to move/look around
Built completely from scratch using only the basic Android canvas

jarvis.name: Jarvis Coursera
jarvis.description:
Messenger bot that parses meaning from user queries and matches them to a set of commands
Made at the Coursera Makeathon

swipler.name: Swipler
swipler.description:
Detect hand gestures using your laptops mic and speakers with the Doppler effect
Switches through or closes tabs when you swipe different directions

intoxicmate.name: IntoxicMate
intoxicmate.description: Uses your location, time, heart-rate etc over time to guess when you are intoxicated. IntoxicMate will then help guide you home, call a cab, or in emergencies call friends/family

myoguitar.name: MyoGuitar
myoguitar.description: Use the Myo to play a virtual guitar on your android device. Detects strums when you have your hand closed and uses your fingers positions to play chords on the phone

war-of-myths.name: War of Myths
war-of-myths.description: Play as a mage and explore the world. Enemies path and search around obstacles, dodge harm, and guess your movement. Started in grade 6 as a flash game, written for android in grade 11

engsoc.name: EngSoc
engsoc.description:
Involved with the Engineering Society as an Engineering Ambassador, Director, and First Year Mentor
Help with specific events like Orientation and some conferences

sipo.name: SIPOFoundation
sipo.description:
In Toronto I got to be part of an organization aiming to Inspire and Equip young professionals
Webmastered and helped run and plan SIPOConference and various SIPOWorkshops

osc.name: Ontario Science Centre
osc.description: Worked as a Host, interacted with visitors and helped with running shows

find-me.name: Find Me
find-me.description: Create and share item lists with your friends through their email. People on a list can move and search for items, display list contents, and add or delete items

flash-games.name: Flash Games
flash-games.description:
A collection of old as2 and as3 flash games made around grade 5 to 8

Follow the link to read descriptions, and play

ring-manager.name: Ring Manager
ring-manager.description: Create sets of ring/vibration settings for different times/days, for example Work: 9-5 Mon-Fri. The current active set decides notification actions for certain contacts or groups
